'''Hearthfire's Trail''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Steak Tartare]] with [[Arlecchino]]. The [[recipe]] for Steak Tartare is obtainable from [[Euphrasie]] for reaching [[Reputation]] level 1 in [[Fontaine]].

Hearthfire's Trail restores '''40'''% of Max HP and an additional '''2,350'''. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
